call_title: Hash it Out | CW, QX, Quokka & Dan | Ergoversary Summit 2024

open_questions.question: Do we know the next arrows of Rosen? Is it going to be after Rosen Light? Is it going to be Rosen Whipped?
open_questions.context: Discussion about future iterations of Rosen Bridge naming conventions

key_facts.fact: Max output transaction was 15,000 outputs done live during Austin meetup at Consensus 2022
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman
